    • About Douglas Ramos


    In real estate since 1994, and a broker/owner since 1998, Douglas Ramos has been leading the North/Central Jersey real estate market with innovative approaches to marketing, systems, and coaching, while building a top- producing team with a “specialist” approach. Douglas launched the CENTURY 21 Alliance Realty New Jersey brand in 2017 and is CEO of the company. Prior to opening CENTURY 21 Alliance Realty, he was the broker/owner of Prudential Alliance Realty and RE/MAX Action Group Realty.

    This blog’s mission is to empower the real estate professional. We will accomplish this by building strong relationships and delivering top-quality training and marketing ideas that will help all agents achieve the highest degree of success in their business and personal life.
